scripts.runLocalDocker: npm run createDockerImage && docker container run --rm -p 8080:8080 --init --name bookutilapi bookutilapi
scripts.setTagToDockerImage: docker tag bookutilapi asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:v1 && docker tag bookutilapi asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:latest
scripts.pushDockerImage: docker push asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:v1 && docker push asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:latest
scripts.deployCloudRun: gcloud run deploy bookutilapi --image asia.gcr.io/bookutil/bookutilapi:v1 --platform managed
